title: T-Minus  (insert accurate answer here) says til WLS
text:
I am having a Gastric Bypass on Jan 12 with Renew Bariatrics. I live in Georgia. Flying to California. I am going to be very open with my journey. I am very much a hobbit, having been there and back again several times on my journey  through weight management. —Feel free to cringe, god knows I am with this language, but I’m trying to be better to myself and the world.—
This is an intro.
I’ll strike more as the iron gets hot.
